main.name: Beth DeCarlo
main.bio: Hi, I'm Beth DeCarlo, a web developer with experience in graphic design. I have a Bachelor of Fine Arts degree from the University of Central Florida. I am also certified in Full Stack Web Development from my alma mater. Whether I am designing marketing materials or building an application, my passion lies in collaborative creativity and problem solving.
main.contactmessage: Let's chat! I'm currently looking for employment opportunities, freelance projects, and open source collaboration.

resume.skillmessage: * Each skill level is weighted in correlation to the remaining skills

education.degree: Coding Bootcamp Certificate - Division of Continuing Education
education.description: Coursework Included: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Express.js, Handlebars, React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, MySQL, Git

education.degree: Bachelor of Fine Arts- College of Arts and Humanities
education.description: Coursework Included: Elements of Design, 2D Design, 3D Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, AutoCAD

work.title: Freelance
work.description: Freelance Designer for small and medium sized businesses in the restaurant and interior design industry throughout Central Florida. Duties included logo and brand design, marketing materials, web design, blog creation and management, and social media management. Using Adboe Creative Cloud, Canva, Figma, Wordpress and more.

work.title: Seminole County Public Schools
work.description: K-12 Education for Seminole County Public Schools. Experience in developmental lesson plan design, classroom management, and Individualized Education Plans. TESL Certified.

work.title: Walt Disney Entertainment
work.description: Graphic design support for Walt Disney's Character Programs and Development. Supported the documentation department in creating graphics, layouts, photo editing, and slideshows. Used Adobe Creative Suite and Microsoft Office.

projects.title: Cryptofolio
projects.info: Node.js, Express, Sequelize, RESTful API, Handlebars, CSS, Bootstrap
